channel.title: cloudcone on endr.in
channel.description: Recent content in cloudcone on endr.in

item.title: 01 Installing the OS
item.description: Table of Content: installing the os Login to the server Changing Date & time Installing the OS You’ll require SSH keys in order to prevent logging in to computer with a password everytime. local computer $ ssh-keygen # Follow the onscreen directions in order to generate the public and the private pair $ cat YOUR_KEY.pub # The public key will appear # Copy the public key. In cloudcone web dashboard
